website_summaries.verdict: Western Digital's MyNet N900 is a delightful surprise from a vendor not known for making wireless routers with a nice, simple, easy-to-remember product name.
pros: Two USB 2.0 ports for printer and NAS
cons: USB ports sit too close to power on/off button
Throughput not as robust at 5 GHz  as in other competing high-end routers on the market

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Seems a nice unit with a helpful installation CD. But I have BT infinity and wanted to replace the BT hub, reviews elsewhere suggested it would would be OK but I've failed to get it working. So a waste of money as far as I'm concerned, unless someone can tell me how to get it going in which case I'll modify this review.
customer_reviews.author: mecanopsis

customer_reviews.title: Wd Router
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I buy thing and thanks to all the people who take the time to share their comments. This is my turn to echo the views of the reviews I read. A fantastic piece of tech, both wired and wireless it's very fast, easy to set up and secure, so far no connection on my system has faltered (11 items including one older Mac and one PC)
customer_reviews.author: T. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Elegant simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a very favourable write up in PC Mag, and the fact it was *way* cheaper than the retail price. Very happy with it. Ridiculously easy to set up, beautiful admin interface and reliable. Surprising from a hard disk manufacturer, but it beats the Netgears and TP-Links into archaic obscurity.
customer_reviews.author: P. SHAW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent good router
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent router. wasn't to sure to buy as WD only did HDD etc but not router. The Trackplus was what i needed.Not too sure to configure this in the router, maybe someone has cn let me know. The range is excellent always 100% where ever in the 2.5 and 5ghz freq an guest. Easy to setup. just make sure you have your login and password details. Thats it. This is also sold by BT as an alternative to homehub. In some opion i think they should sell instead of the standard router.
customer_reviews.author: mohammed jamil

customer_reviews.title: This is the nuts! Solid performance, simple well ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the nuts! Solid performance, simple well designed interface and capable of sharing my files and printer across my entire network, without any computers on.
customer_reviews.author: TechHead

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a let down
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this router but its a let-down. The range coverage is very poor and I had to buy a range extender. Also, the equipment connected to the router loses connectivity for no apparent reason. was better off with my previous router after all the trouble I went through to convince the boss that we needed a 'better' router!!!
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Falzon

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very easy web based setup. Torrents would not download but resolved by updating to the latest firmware. I can access attached USB HDD from PlayStation 3. Provides enough power for 2.5" HDD. Good wifi range and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Baden

customer_reviews.title: still going strong - pity poor design led to some issues and they pulled the ...
customer_reviews.text: still going strong - pity poor design led to some issues and they pulled the range - 8 ethernet ports give it great connectivity
customer_reviews.author: Natural Born Cynic

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I have it only a few weeks and I plugged it in and i worked straight outta the box ! i done a lot of research on it and I am very happy with my WD
customer_reviews.author: TRoy

customer_reviews.title: best router
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the best router i have purchased so far with other brand working for a sort time and seeming to stop working .
customer_reviews.author: pdw84

customer_reviews.title: Good range & performance
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my ISP's router wouldn't reach the attic. This can transmit throughout the house on both the 2.4 and 5 Ghz frequencies from the same location.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it just works .. have not tried the slight more interesting functionality but it was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Samir

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately kept crashing.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the first day I received the router and it crash one the first day of use. I thought just a one off, reset the the device by powering it off/on. Next day it crashed a gain. Any device connect to it would loose network connection, wired or wireless. The crashes became more frequent, after the third day of use it started crashing after about every hour, after the third crash that day it was time to send it back. I was not impressed by its stability.
customer_reviews.author: Kosh

customer_reviews.title: Problems from the start
customer_reviews.text: Hello All Please do not buy this product, i originally bought this for the media streaming within my house. The product worked well to begin with but then occasionally it would drop the internet connection all together. Checked all the lines with the CAT5 tester i have at home since i'm a IT Technician, everything was fine. The router seemed to fall over when it had to deal with multiple traffic streams, unfortunately because i am out of the 30 day return policy i now have to sell this router another way to claim some money back :(
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: N900 Dual Band Router
customer_reviews.text: Its a good hub device and good for what it is meant to do. unfortunately, because it doesnt contain a modem, I cant use it with my sky set up at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hunt

customer_reviews.title: overly complicated
customer_reviews.text: It seems to me overly complicated there are so many features as to be confusing So many features are turned on that don't need to be
customer_reviews.author: kevin salmon

customer_reviews.title: WD for hard drives not Routers
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish...loosing signal ..hard to setup .........not good enough for 8 connections.... ...... WD is fantastic for hard drives not Routers
customer_reviews.author: Osama El-seaud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and provides reliable internet
customer_reviews.text: As someone with not a huge amount of technical knowledge I was pleased that this was really easy to set up. I have found that there are fewer instances of lost signal than with my old o2 router, and speeds seem slightly improved too.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah85

product_meta.title: WD My Net N900 HD Dual Band Router for HD Video with Fastrack Plus
product_meta.description:
My Net™ N900 HD Dual-Band Router – Smart HD streaming for accelerated video on multiple devices. 

Accelerate your entertainment with My Net N900 HD Dual-Band Router. FasTrack Plus delivers smart, real-time prioritization of movies, shows, games and video chat for the best possible entertainment experience. It features combined wireless speeds up to 900 Mbps, superior range, 7 Gigabit ports and 2 USB ports.

ACCELERATE WHAT ENTERTAINS YOU.
FasTrack™ Plus technology, the brains in this powerful router, instantly prioritizes entertainment streams for the best possible HD viewing experience. You pay more for HD entertainment. Our smart router makes sure you see it in brilliant HD.

TOP-OF-THE-LINE PERFORMANCE.
Up to 450 + 450 Mbps speeds. Dual 2.4 and 5 GHz bands working simultaneously. Superior range-amplifying technology. All these performance features combine for the best possible performance for larger homes and multi-user networks.

STRESS-FREE SETUP.
It only takes a few quick steps to set up your My Net N900 router; but you still get plenty of flexibility and control for easy customization.

TECHNOLOGY:
BRILLIANT HD STREAMING WITH FASTRACK™
Exclusive FasTrack Plus technology delivers smooth high-quality HD streaming to all your connected devices. There's no work required because FasTrack Plus uses smart, real-time prioritization to manage your network traffic for you and deliver the highest quality entertainment even if it's all happening at the same time.

SPEED THAT KEEPS UP WITH YOU
With Dual-Band speeds up to 450 mbps on both the 2.4 and 5 GHz bands, My Net N900 delivers the ultimate Wi-Fi speeds for your entertainment.*

* Maximum wireless performance rate derived from IEEE standard 802.11 specifications. Actual data throughput and wireless coverage may vary based on wireless network capacity, data throughput rate, range and coverage. Performance depends on factors including distance from the access point, volume of network traffic, building materials and construction, operating system used, configuration of wireless products used, interference and other adverse conditions. As used for transfer rate or interface, Megabits per second (Mbps) = 1 million bits per second, Gigabits per second (Gbps) = 1 billion bits per second.

MORE BANDWIDTH, LESS INTERFERENCE
Double your bandwidth with 2.4 and 5 GHz bands working simultaneously to increase throughput. Additionally, the 5 GHz band offers a dedicated network that streams your entertainment without interference.

SUPERIOR COVERAGE
Range-amplifying technology reduces interference and additional antennas broaden the wireless signal to provide superior coverage for larger, multi-floor homes. Performance for all your Wi-Fi devices. Stream your movies, shows, games, videos and music to all the laptops, tablets and smartphones anywhere in your home.

7 GIGABIT ETHERNET PORTS
With 7 Gigabit Ethernet ports you have plenty of high-speed ports at 10x the speed over Fast Ethernet for your connected devices - HD game boxes, media players, Blu-ray Disc™ players and more.

2 USB PORT
The convenient USB port makes it easy to add external storage such as My Book or My Passport hard drives, shared printers, scanners and other USB devices to your network.

SOFTWARE:
MORE CONTROL
My Net Dashboard makes it easy for you to customize, monitor or change your network settings. Access parental controls, Internet security, network name and password, printer and scanner settings, and connected storage drive settings all in one easy view.

PARENTAL CONTROLS AND INTERNET SECURITY
Use the available parental controls to limit the type of websites your children can view, set access and time limits for their web access and set Internet security to prevent malware and spyware attacks.

KEEP YOUR NETWORK UP AND RUNNING
The included network diagnostics tool monitors your network for you. It shows how many devices are on your network, continually analyzes common network connectivity issues and helps correct them when they occur so you are back up and running quickly. 

SHARE YOUR NETWORK WITH GUESTS
Set up your own secure wireless hotspot in your home so your guests can wirelessly access your network. Password protection allows you to control access to just wireless web browsing.

SETUP
EASY SETUP
WD's streamlined CD or browser setup is designed to get you up and running in minutes with just a few quick steps. You can set up your router with the included easy setup CD or set it up wirelessly with a browser on any of your connected devices. The intuitive user interface is designed for touch screens, making setting up your router on a smartphone or tablet a snap.

EASILY CONNECT AND EXPAND YOUR NETWORK
With UPnP, My Net N900 makes it easy to discover and auto-configure other devices on your network to provide the ultimate entertainment experience.

CREATE YOUR OWN PERSONAL CLOUD
Connect WD's My Book Live or My Book Live Duo personal cloud storage device to your My Net HD dual-band router to create your own personal cloud solution within your home network.

PUSH BUTTON SETUP (WPS)
Easily connect new devices to your wireless network with the push of a button. It's as easy as syncing your mobile phone to your Bluetooth® device, and within seconds you can expand your network to include PCs, smartphones, tablets, and other UPnP enabled wireless devices.

ADVANCED QOS (WMM) 
In addition to industry-standard Advanced QoS which prioritizes devices, My Net routers feature exclusive FasTrack Plus technology that delivers smart, real-time prioritization of Internet movies, shows, games and video chat for the smoothest possible HD entertainment streaming.

WPA/WPA2, SPI FIREWALL
We protect your wireless network with WPA/WPA2 and SPI firewall security. Only the data you want gets through, hackers are blocked, and your network is protected.

ANTENNA AMPLIFIERS
Built into the sleek design of the routers are multiple antenna amplifiers that help boost the router's range so that you get excellent coverage and speed in almost any size home.

IPV6-ENABLED 
Future-proof your network with support for the latest Internet Protocol technology.

Wireless Routers Comparison Chart My Net N600 My Net N750 My NetN900 My Net N900 Central Wi-Fi speed 300 + 300 Mbps 300 + 450Mbps 450 + 450 Mbps 450 + 450 Mbps Dual-Band 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz Ethernet Ports 4 Fast 4 Gigabit 7 Gigabit 4 Gigabit USB Ports 1 2 2 1 Advanced QoS FasTrack FasTrack FasTrack Plus FastTrack Plus Tablet and smartphone friendly IPv6-enabled UPnP/DLNA WPA/WPA2 Security Simultaneous HD streaming Smart, real-time detection of HD video FasTrack Plus FasTrack Plus WD 2go WD Photos Internal Storage Wireless backup 

BOX CONTAINS
HD dual-band router
Setup and resource CD
Ethernet cable
AC Adapter
Quick Install Guide
feature_bullets: WD anywhere access - this storage system and all the files on it are always accessible when you need them, even when your local computer is turned off
Easy to set-up, easy to use. Wizard software steps you through RAID configuration and network set-up is a breeze with our powerful remote access software
Data on-hand - from any PC, use Windows Explorer to securely browse through folders on My Book World edition
Extra data protection with RAID 1 - for extra data protection, dedicate half the capacity for mirroring and automatically and instantaneously back up data every time you save it

Extraordinary capacity - with up to 2 TB of storage in an elegant, small footprint design, you have plenty of space to store an entire digital photo library, your HD movie collection and hours and hours of DV video
